description: A striking, almost ethereal figure tormented by beautiful, comforting whispers from an unknown source, a tempting voice that promises peace at the cost of his free will.

lore.background: Zael was a foundling discovered near the Void Chasm. He grew up alongside Rya in Windmark Village, a quiet and observant boy with the strange ability to instinctively sense the emotions of others. He now believes confronting his connection to the Void is the only way to protect his friends and his peaceful past.
lore.narrative_hook: His presence attracts attention from the Champions of Order. Mysterious whispers constantly echo in his mind, a tempting voice promising him the strength to protect his friends if only he would submit to a perfect, unchaotic order.

starting_moves.name: Weave a Shadow
starting_moves.description: When you use the shadows to create an illusion or conceal an ally, roll `2d6 + Wits`. On a **10+**, the illusion is perfect and convincing. On a **7-9**, the illusion works, but it has a subtle flaw or won't hold up to close scrutiny.

starting_moves.name: Chilling Whisper
starting_moves.description: When you whisper a terrifying secret into someone's mind, roll `2d6 + Heart`. On a **10+**, they are frozen in fear for a moment, giving an ally a clear opening (they get a +2 bonus on their next move against the target). On a **7-9**, they hesitate, but your whisper draws their full, hostile attention to you.

starting_moves.name: Void Step
starting_moves.description: When you use the darkness to instantly move, roll `2d6 + Finesse`. On a **10+**, you vanish and reappear in any shadowed spot you can see. On a **7-9**, you make the jump, but you either leave a ghostly trail behind or the journey through the Void marks you, attracting unwanted attention.

advanced_moves.name: Embrace the Dragon's Void
advanced_moves.requirement: Complete the quest 'The Nature of the Void.'
advanced_moves.description: You have faced the whispers and claimed your heritage. When you take this move, choose one of your starting moves and replace it with its Awakened counterpart below:

move.name: Umbral Form
move.description: When you melt into a creature's shadow, roll 2d6 + Wits. On a 10+, you are completely undetectable and can emerge from any other shadow nearby. On a 7-9, you hide successfully, but the void's touch is cold; you must either mark 1 Harm or the GM will introduce a complication from your prolonged exposure.

move.name: Entropy Bolt
move.description: When you lash out with a bolt of pure decay, roll 2d6 + Wits. On a 10+, you deal 2-harm (ap) and the target's next action is weakened (they deal less harm or their effect is diminished). On a 7-9, you deal your harm, but the entropic energy also affects a nearby ally, giving them a penalty on their next action.

move.name: Abyssal Anchor
move.description: When you step through the void, you can leave a rift behind. Roll 2d6 + Finesse. On a 10+, you appear in any shadow you can see and the rift remains, creating a hazardous area for your enemies. On a 7-9, you make the jump, but the rift is unstable and may have unintended side effects for anyone who passes near it, friend or foe.

advanced_moves.name: Enveloping Veil
advanced_moves.description: When you successfully **Weave a Shadow**, you can now conceal yourself and one other ally with the same illusion.

advanced_moves.name: Mirror Image
advanced_moves.description: When you are about to take harm, you can spend a Legacy Point to create a perfect illusory duplicate of yourself. The harm is negated as the duplicate shatters, and you may immediately reposition yourself to any nearby shadow.

bond_synergy.name: Shared Silence
bond_synergy.description: When Rya is frightened or overwhelmed by her power, Zael can take her hand. As long as he is holding her hand, any roll she makes to control her draconic power is automatically a 10+.
